name: BookSwap Tests

on: [push, pull_request]

jobs:
  test:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
    - uses: actions/checkout@v4
    - uses: actions/setup-dotnet@v4
      with:
        dotnet-version: '8.0.x'

    - name: Restore
      run: dotnet restore

    - name: Run tests
      run: dotnet test --collect:"XPlat Code Coverage"
